mapper.select: SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.personal.info.model.mapper.PersonalInfoMapper#selectshallowBrowsingNum() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_RESUME_READING_HISTORY A JOIN TBL_RESUME B ON (A.RESUME_NO = B.RESUME_NO) WHERE RESUME_BROWSE_KINDS = '얕은열람' AND B.IN_MEM_NO = #{ memNo } AND B.RESUME_SCOUT_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.personal.info.model.mapper.PersonalInfoMapper#selectDeepBrowsingNum() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_RESUME_READING_HISTORY A JOIN TBL_RESUME B ON (A.RESUME_NO = B.RESUME_NO) WHERE RESUME_BROWSE_KINDS = '깊은열람' AND B.IN_MEM_NO = '3' AND B.RESUME_SCOUT_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.personal.info.model.mapper.PersonalInfoMapper#selectinterviewProposalNum() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_INTERVIEW_PROPOSAL WHERE IN_MEM_NO = '3'

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.personal.info.model.mapper.PersonalInfoMapper#selectApplicationCompletedNum() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_APPLYING_HISTORY A LEFT JOIN TBL_RESUME B ON (A.RESUME_NO = B.RESUME_NO) WHERE B.IN_MEM_NO = '3' AND A.JOB_POST_APPLYING_STATUS = '지원완료'

SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.personal.info.model.mapper.PersonalInfoMapper#selectApplicationCanceledNum() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_APPLYING_HISTORY A LEFT JOIN TBL_RESUME B ON (A.RESUME_NO = B.RESUME_NO) WHERE B.IN_MEM_NO = '3' AND A.JOB_POST_APPLYING_STATUS = '지원취소'
SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.personal.info.model.mapper.PersonalInfoMapper#selectBookmarkNum() */ COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOOKMARK WHERE IN_MEM_NO = '3'
SELECT RC.IN_MEM_NO , RC.CO_COM_NAME , RC.CO_MEM_NO FROM TBL_RESTRICTED_COMPANY RC WHERE IN_MEM_NO = #{ memNo }
